flawed_nl_solution:
There are 8 + 2 = <<8+2=9>>9 green beans.
There are 9 -1 = <<9-1=8>>8 orange beans.
There are 8 black + 9 green + 8 orange = <<8+9+8=25>>25 jelly beans.
